rows.label: qst202022_msg0001
rows.name:
So Musubi-san has indeed returned 
to her Core Crystal...

rows.label: qst202022_msg0002
rows.name:
She must have been surprised... 
for this to happen so suddenly...

rows.label: qst202022_msg0003
rows.name: Can we resonate with her again, meh?

rows.label: qst202022_msg0004
rows.name:
After some time passes and the 
Core Crystal returns to its usual color.

rows.label: qst202022_msg0005
rows.name:
But then, she won't have memories 
of her time with Dofusei-san, meh?

rows.label: qst202022_msg0007
rows.name:
As long as we are Blades, 
that is our unavoidable fate.

rows.label: qst202022_msg0010
rows.name:
If Hana and the others remember, 
we can tell Musubi about it, meh.

rows.label: qst202022_msg0011
rows.name:
I'm sure Musubi would be happy 
to hear about it, meh.

rows.label: qst202022_msg0013
rows.name: And we need to make Musubi-san happy, just as Old Man wished.
